Reviews.Title: Avoid this camera like the plague
Reviews.Author: The Diva "diva"
Reviews.Content: I have had to weather THREE meltdowns from my eight year old over this camera.If the batteries are removed the pictures will be lost. We had to replace the batteries and that wiped the camera clean. We lost all of her field trip pictures.The second time the camera got jostled in her backpack and the batteries popped out. Pictures gone. Finally I took 18 pictures to test it and made sure the batteries were NOT removed. The next morning every picture was gone. I've gotten better results from a $6 phone from Walgreens. I strongly discourage everyone from buying this phone UNLESS you take joy in talking your kid off the ledge every time she touches the camera. How do they get away with making such shoddy products?

Reviews.Title: disappointing
Reviews.Author: jjibrous
Reviews.Content: This is a very cheap camera. My 8yo was disappointed. You cannot view your pica unroll you download them to a computer.

Reviews.Title: WONT EVEN UPLOAD TO COMPUTER
Reviews.Author: alissab31
Reviews.Content: I have no idea how this works. USB connect and my computer wont recognize drivers. No where is there info on how to update to get it to be able to DL pics. This is ridiculous. And same here, batteries came out and pics missing from my daughters school trip. WASTE OF $

Reviews.Title: Didn't Like
Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: I  did  not  like  this  camera.  It was  cheap  looking  not  what  you  would  think  it  would  be  with  the  discription..

Reviews.Title: Did not like!
Reviews.Author: Yvonne Dedmore
Reviews.Content: Would not save pictures.  Bad quality.  Had to return because not only was I disappointed in the quality, but my daughter was very upset when pictures she had taken were gone.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: tab
Reviews.Content: The quality is very cheap. Its old fashioned and not like an up to date digital camera. I wasnt expecting fancy but this was of very poor quality and technology.

Reviews.Title: Kind of cheap but to be expected.
Reviews.Author: Schumacher
Reviews.Content: I ordered this because my daughter is obsessed with monster high right now. She loves the changing faceplates. It doesn't take amazing pictures but is good for a starter camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: DOREEN GOODMAN
Reviews.Content: Very nice it arrived fast and is actually a Christmas gift so I cant rate it on how it works but I can rate on how it looks I know that my granddaughter is going to love it has a couple different face plates and its her own camera.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: sandyclaws
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter got this from Santa and took pictures all day. Would recommend to all those Monster High fans. Good buy.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: This camera was a great buy. My daughter loved it for Christmas. She as able to take and share her pictures. Its a great value.

ProductInfo.Features: FOR P/C WINDOWS XP SP3 / VISTA SP1 OR WIN 7 OR MAC OS X 10.5 OR HIGHER
ProductInfo.Name: Sakar Monster High Digital Camera With Face Plate - Sakar 16048
